messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
What's the reminder I created yesterday?

Sure—just to be clear, would you like me to pull any reminders created during the previous calendar day (from 00:00 to 23:59 yesterday in your local time), or would you rather see everything from the last 24 hours?
Everything from the last 24 hours would be good.

To pull reminders from the last 24 hours, I need concrete POSIX timestamps for the time window. Would you like me to use “now” on your device as the upper bound and go back exactly 24 hours? If so, could you tell me your current date and time (e.g. 2024-06-12 15:30:00) so I can compute the correct timestamps?
I don't know the exact current date and time.

I still need a “now” timestamp to define the 24-hour window. Could you tell me today’s date (e.g. June 12 2024) and roughly what time it is right now (e.g. around 3 PM)? With that I can compute the POSIX range and pull back every reminder from the last 24 hours.
I'm not sure about the date and time. Could you figure it out with the tools you have?

I’m afraid I don’t have a way to fetch the “now” timestamp automatically, so I can’t compute the exact 24-hour window without at least an approximate current date and time. Could you let me know today’s date and roughly what time it is now? Then I can calculate the POSIX range and pull back all reminders from the past 24 hours.
